name: Weapon Reconnaissance
description:
Game by Kai Jarmon

Enemies have placed active dangerous weapons inside your underground compound.  Help the recovery vehicles safely navigate to the weapons in order to deactivate them.  Be careful for the black holes and be sure to stay safe when crossing the bridges!  

Players must show their problem solving skills in this underground compound themed puzzle game.  

Controls:

W- Forwards

A- Left

S- Backwards

D- Right

Space Bar- Duplicate Recovery Vehicle

Game Objectives:

In order to stop the active weapons you must be able to successfully navigate the recovery vehicles to the weapons.  Make sure a recovery vehicle is covering both of the weapons on either side of the map to move on to the next level!  The game is played by using the WASD keys to navigate the recovery vehicles through the map.  At the beginning of each level you start in the middle of the map with one recovery vehicle.  To create two recovery vehicles press the space bar, then use the WASD keys to navigate both vehicles to the different sides of the map to find the weapons.  The recovery vehicles move together in unison so you will need to use the obstacles around the map to your advantage to adjust the position of vehicles.  Remember that when placed in the below an obstacle the recovery vehicle can be duplicated on top of obstacles in order to help you cross black holes.  

Assets Used:

Tank Constructor by HIPPO

Metal Crates Pack by ELDANU
